skills.name: Mana Bubble
skills.description: Bursts a mana bubble that deals damage to an enemy and removes a beneficial effect with a 50% chance. The damage of this skill increases according to your MAX HP.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.multiplier_formula: 2.5*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.12*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Air Shield
skills.description: Removes all harmful effects on an ally target and casts a shield that lasts for 3 turns. The shield amount is proportionate to the Monster's level.

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage

skills.name: Song of the Sirens
skills.description: Sings an irresistible song that seduces all enemies and puts them into sleep for 1 turn.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage
